name: SyphilisTests
title: Syphilis Tests
description: This value set is used for Family Planning Annual Report (FPAR) reporting.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for syphilis testing.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Observation.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that identify tests conducted at the point of care, rapid testing, or laboratory tests to detect syphilis.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
